SEARCH
Package lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Environment

Class Lighting

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Environment.Lighting
public class Lighting extends Object

Lighting

The Lighting class provides a lighting effect that changes the view of the hero in the game. It creates a darkness filter with a light circle at the center, resulting in a spotlight-like effect. The darkness filter is applied to the game panel to modify the visual appearance of the hero's surroundings. This class encapsulates the logic for creating the darkness filter and applying the light circle effect.
